00132 #define IsArc_(x,y)                 (mCross[x][y] < mCross[y][x])
00133 #define Weight_(x,y)                (mCross[y][x] - mCross[x][y])

00167     integer minimum ( integer a , integer b){
00168         if ( a < b ) return a;
00169         else return b;
00170     }

00172     integer totalCrossPm (){
00173     // uses mCross to compute the crossings
00174         node nodeU,nodeV;
00175         integer cross = 0;
00176         for (int u=0; u < AG.size(); u++){
00177             nodeU = arrayApm2[ u ];   
00178             for (int v=u+1; v < AG.size(); v++){
00179                 nodeV = arrayApm2[ v ];
00180 
00181                 if ( indexApm2[nodeU] < indexApm2[nodeV]) cross += mCross[nodeU][nodeV];
00182                 else if ( indexApm2[nodeU] > indexApm2[nodeV]) cross += mCross[nodeV][nodeU];
00183                 else cross += minimum( mCross[nodeU][nodeV], mCross[nodeV][nodeU] );
00184 
00185             }
00186        
00187         }
00188         return cross;
00189     }

00221     void readFromFile(){
00222             ifstream pmin( "D:\\Belgelerim\\PM\\problem" , ios::in );
00223 
00224             int source  , target , nodeA ,nodeB;
00225                        
00226             pmin >> nodeA;
00227             pmin >> nodeB;
00228             matrix mpm(nodeA,nodeB);
00229            
00230             while ( ! pmin.eof() ){
00231 
00232                 pmin >> source;
00233                 pmin >> target;
00234 
00235                 mpm[source][target - nodeA ] = 1;
00236             }
00237             m2g(Gpm,AG,BG,mpm,true);
00238 
00239             pmin.close();
00240         }

00282     integer crossCount_( node u , node v , node_array<int> &naiA, node_array<int> &naiB, GRAPH<int,int> &G) {
00283    
00284       
00285         integer total = 0;
00286         list<edge> outU , outV;
00287       
00288         outU = G.out_edges(u);
00289         outV = G.out_edges(v);
00290         edge e,e1;
00291         forall(e,outU)
00292             forall(e1,outV){
00293                 if (  naiA[ G.source(e)] < naiA[ G.source(e1) ] && naiB[ G.target(e)] > naiB[ G.target(e1) ]
00294                     || naiA[ G.source(e)] > naiA[ G.source(e1) ] && naiB[ G.target(e)] < naiB[ G.target(e1) ]    )
00295                             total.operator += (G[e]);
00296        }
00297         return total;
00298     }
00299 
00300     integer lowerBound(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A,list<node> &B){
00301        
00302         node u,v;
00303         node_matrix<integer> m(G);
00304         node_array<int> naiA(G);
00305         node_array<int> naiB(G);
00306                             
00307         node n;
00308         int i = 0;
00309         forall(n,A){
00310             naiA[n] = i;
00311             i++;
00312         }
00313 
00314         i = 0;
00315         forall(n,B){
00316             naiB[n] = i;
00317             i++;
00318         }
00319 
00320         integer sum=0;
00321         integer t1,t2;
00322         forall(u,A){
00323             forall(v,A){
00324                 if ( naiA[u] != naiA[v] && naiA[u] > 0 ){
00325                     t1 = crossCount_(u,v,naiA,naiB,G);
00326                     t2 = crossCount_(v,u,naiA,naiB,G);
00327                     if ( t1 > t2 ){
00328                         sum = sum + t2;
00329                     }else{
00330                         sum = sum + t1;
00331                     }
00332                     naiA[u] *= -1;
00333                     naiA[v] *= -1;
00334                
00335                    
00336                 }
00337             }
00338         }
00339 
00340         return sum;
00341     }

00364     void WDFS( node inRoot , bool &thruRemoved , node_array<int> &theVisited , node_array<int> &theParent, int &thruPenaltyArcs){
00365 
00366         integer  theCycleLength, theMinWeight;
00367         node theAdj , theStart , theEnd;
00368         int j , i;
00369         theVisited[ inRoot ] = DOING;
00370 
00371 #ifdef DEBUG
00372         afile << "\tvisiting :: ";
00373         afile << indexApm[inRoot] << " \n";
00374 
00375         afile << "\tcalled from  :: ";
00376         afile <<  theParent[inRoot]<< " \n\n";
00377 #endif
00378 
00379         for( i = 0; i < AG.size(); i++ ){
00380             theAdj = arrayApm[i];
00381             if ( IsArc_(inRoot,theAdj) ){
00382                 thruPenaltyArcs++;
00383            
00384                 if (theVisited[theAdj] == DOING) {
00385                    
00386                     theStart = inRoot;
00387                     theEnd = theAdj;
00388                     theMinWeight = Weight_( theStart , theEnd );
00389                    
00390                     for( j = indexApm[inRoot]; j != i ; j = theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ]  ){
00391 
00392                         if ( ! IsArc_( arrayApm [ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ] ] , arrayApm[j] ) )
00393                             break;
00394                         if ( Weight_( arrayApm [ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ] ] , arrayApm[ j ] ) < theMinWeight ){
00395                             theMinWeight = Weight_( arrayApm [ theParent[ arrayApm[ j ] ] ] , arrayApm[j] );
00396                             theStart = arrayApm[ theParent [ arrayApm[j] ] ];
00397                             theEnd = arrayApm[j];
00398                         }
00399                     }
00400 
00401                     if ( j == i ) {
00402                         integer theCrossSE = mCross[theStart][theEnd];
00403                         integer theCrossES = mCross[theEnd][theStart];
00404 
00405                         thruRemoved = true;
00406 
00407                         theCycleLength = 1;
00408 
00409                         for ( j = indexApm[inRoot]; j != i;  j = theParent[  arrayApm[ j ]  ]   ){
00410 
00411                             theCycleLength++;
00412                             mCross[ arrayApm[j] ] [ arrayApm[ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] ] ]  += theCrossSE;
00413                             mCross[ arrayApm[ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] ] ] [ arrayApm[j] ]  += theCrossES;
00414 
00415 
00416                         if(  Weight_(  arrayApm[ theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] ] ,  arrayApm[ j ] ) == 0  )
00417                             cout << "---- Removed arc :: " << theParent[  arrayApm[ j ] ] << " , " << j << "of weight " << theMinWeight <<"\n\n";
00418   
00419                         }
00420                         mCross[theAdj][inRoot] += theCrossSE;
00421                         mCross[inRoot][theAdj] += theCrossES;
00422 
00423                     if (theStart==inRoot && theEnd==theAdj && Weight_(inRoot,theAdj) == 0 )
00424                           cout << "---Removed arc (" << indexApm[inRoot] <<" , " << indexApm[theAdj] << ") of weight " << theMinWeight << "\n";
00425                        
00426                     cout << "\t---Cycle length is ::" << theCycleLength << "\n";
00427                     printNodeMatrix(mCross , AG );
00428 
00429                     }
00430                 }
00431                 else if ( theVisited[theAdj] == NONE ){
00432                     theParent[theAdj] = indexApm[inRoot];
00433                     WDFS(theAdj,thruRemoved,theVisited,theParent,thruPenaltyArcs);
00434                 }
00435             }
00436     }
00437        
00438 #ifdef parent
00439         afile << "in wdfs :: ";
00440         printNodeArray( theVisited , "the visited:: ");
00441 
00442         afile << "in wdfs :: ";
00443         printNodeArray( theParent , "the parent :: ");
00444 #endif
00445 
00446         theVisited[inRoot] = DONE;
00447     }
00448 
00449     void WDFSOrder ( node inRoot , node_array<int> &theVisited , int &inPosition ) {
00450             int theAdj;
00451 
00452             theVisited[inRoot] = DONE;
00453 #ifdef DEBUG
00454             afile << "\tinposition :: " << inPosition << "\n";   
00455 #endif
00456 
00457 #ifdef parent
00458             afile << "in order :: ";
00459             printNodeArray(theVisited , "theVisited : ");
00460 #endif
00461             for( theAdj = 0; theAdj < AG.size(); theAdj++ ){
00462                 if( theVisited[ arrayApm[theAdj] ] == NONE && IsArc_(inRoot,arrayApm[theAdj]) )
00463                     WDFSOrder(arrayApm[theAdj] , theVisited , inPosition );
00464             }
00465            
00466             arrayApm2[ indexApm[inRoot] ] = arrayApm [ AG.size() -( inPosition ) - 1  ];
00467             // if ( inPosition < AG.size()-1 )
00468             inPosition++;
00469     }

00481     void index(){
00482         node n;
00483         int i = 0;
00484        
00485         forall(n,AG){
00486             indexApm[n] = i;
00487             i++;
00488         }
00489         i = 0;
00490         forall(n,AG){
00491             indexApm2[n] = i;
00492             i++;
00493         }   
00494         i = 0;
00495         forall(n,BG){
00496             indexBpm[n] = i;
00497             i++;
00498         }
00499 
00500         i = 0;
00501         forall(n,AG){
00502             arrayApm[i] = n;
00503             i++;
00504         }
00505 
00506         i = 0;
00507         forall_nodes(n,Gpm){
00508             Gpm[n]=i;
00509             i++;
00510         }
00511     }

00513     integer crossCount ( list<edge> outU , list<edge> outV , bool UinRight ) {
00514        
00515         integer total = 0;
00516        
00517         edge e,e1;
00518         forall(e,outU)
00519             forall(e1,outV){
00520                 if( UinRight ){
00521                     if ( indexBpm[ Gpm.target(e)] < indexBpm[ Gpm.target(e1) ]    )
00522                             total += ( Gpm[e] * Gpm[e1] );
00523                 }else {
00524                       if ( indexBpm[ Gpm.target(e)] > indexBpm[ Gpm.target(e1) ]  )
00525                             total += ( Gpm[e] * Gpm[e1]  );
00526                 }
00527         }
00528 
00529         return total;
00530     }

00533     void BuildCrossTable (){
00534       
00535        
00536         node u,v;
00537         list<edge> outU;
00538         list<edge> outV;
00539       
00540        forall(u,AG)
00541             forall(v,AG){
00542                 if( indexApm[u] != indexApm[v] ){
00543                        
00544                     outU = Gpm.out_edges(u);
00545                     outV = Gpm.out_edges(v);
00546                        
00547                     mCross(u,v) = crossCount(outU,outV,false);
00548                     mCross(v,u) = crossCount(outU,outV,true );
00549                 }                   
00550         }
00551     }
00552 
00553     void destroyCrossTable(){
00554     node u,v;   
00555         forall(u,AG)
00556                 forall(v,AG)
00557                     mCross(u,v) = 0;
00558     }
00559     void initGlobals(){
00560 
00561         indexApm2.init(Gpm);
00562         indexApm.init(Gpm);
00563         indexBpm.init(Gpm);
00564         mCross.init(Gpm);
00565         node x;
00566         forall_nodes( x, Gpm ){
00567             AG.append( x );
00568         }
00569         arrayApm.resize(AG.size());
00570         arrayApm2.resize(AG.size());
00571 
00572     }
00573     void RunPMAlgorithm( GRAPH<int,int> &G ) {
00574            
00575             Gpm = G;
00576             integer originalCross , nowCross;
00577             initGlobals();
00578            
00579             int thePenaltyArcs;
00580             bool theRemoved;
00581             node_array<int> theVisited(Gpm) , theParent(Gpm);
00582             int  theSortCounter = 0 ;
00583             float theStartTime = 0;
00584             index();
00585             theRuns = 0;
00586 #ifdef time        
00587             time_t t0 = time (0);
00588             // afile <<  "start time ::" << t0 << "\n";
00589 #endif
00590 #ifdef write
00591             writeToFileForPM(Gpm,AG,BG);   
00592 #endif
00593 Repeat :
00594             afile << "********************************************\n";
00595             afile << "REPEAT " << theRuns << "\n";
00596             afile << "********************************************\n\n";
00597 
00598             thePenaltyArcs     = 0;
00599             BuildCrossTable ();
00600 
00601 
00602 #ifdef DEBUG
00603           
00604             afile << "indexApm at the start ::"; // 0 1 2 3 4 5 die sıralı oarak basıcak initial cond.
00605             printOrder(indexApm);
00606                       
00607             printNodeMatrix( mCross , AG ); // initial cross table
00608             afile << "\nFirst Visit ::: \n";
00609 #endif
00610             theRemoved = false;
00611            
00612             node n;
00613             forall(n,AG){
00614                 theVisited[n] = NONE;
00615                 theParent[n] = -1;
00616             }
00617            
00618            
00619             for(int i = 0; i < arrayApm.size(); i++ ){
00620                 node n = arrayApm[i];
00621                 if ( theVisited[ n ] == NONE )
00622                     WDFS( n , theRemoved ,theVisited , theParent , thePenaltyArcs );
00623             }
00624                       
00625             while ( theRemoved == true ) {
00626 #ifdef DEBUG
00627                 afile << "\n\nNew Visit ::: \n";
00628 #endif   
00629                 theRemoved = false;
00630                
00631                 /* clear theVisited */
00632                 forall(n,AG){
00633                     theVisited[n] = NONE;
00634                     theParent[n] = -1;
00635                 }
00636 
00637                 for(int i = 0; i < arrayApm.size(); i++ ){
00638                     node n = arrayApm[i];
00639                     if ( theVisited[ n ] == NONE )
00640                         WDFS( n , theRemoved , theVisited , theParent , thePenaltyArcs );
00641                 }
00642            
00643             }
00644             theSortCounter = 0;
00645 
00646 #ifdef DEBUG
00647             afile << "\n\nLast Visit ::: \n";
00648 #endif           
00649             forall(n,AG){ // memset replacement
00650                 theVisited[n] = NONE;
00651             }
00652 
00653             for(int i = 0; i < arrayApm.size(); i++ ){
00654                 node n = arrayApm[i];
00655                 if ( theVisited[n] == NONE )
00656                     WDFSOrder( n , theVisited , theSortCounter );
00657             }
00658 
00659            
00660 #ifdef   parent   
00661             
00662             printNodeArray(theVisited , "\ntheVisited:: " );
00663             printNodeArray(theParent , "theParent :: " );
00664    
00665 
00666 #endif           
00667        
00668 #ifdef time            
00669             time_t t1 = time (0);
00670            
00671             //afile << "end time ::" << t1 << "\n";
00672 #endif
00673 #ifdef DEBUG                       
00674                list<node> AAA;
00675             index2();
00676             orderAG( AAA );
00677             AG = AAA;
00678             nowCross = crossing_numberM( Gpm , AG , BG );
00679 #endif
00680 #ifdef DEBUG
00681              afile << "\nCross count with ( AAA ) :: " << nowCross << "\n\n";
00682        
00683 #endif                   
00684             // BuildCrossTable();
00685             //printNodeMatrix( mCross , AG );
00686 }
00687 #endif

00689 /********************** (Melih burdan baslıo)   BARY CENTER GRAPH    *******************************/
00690 
00691 void barycenter_graph( GRAPH<int,int> &G ,list<node> &A, list<node> B )
00692 {
00693  node n,u,v;
00694  node x;
00695  node temp;
00696  node a,b,m;
00697 
00698     list<edge> elist,elist2,elist1,templist;
00699  list<node> A1;
00700  node_array<double> total_sum( G );
00701  node_array<double> total_bary( G );
00702  node_array<int> total_vindex( G );
00703  node_array<double> index_u( G );
00704  node_array<double> index_v( G );
00705 
00706     edge e;
00707  list_item it;
00708  double max = 0;
00709  int i = 1;
00710 
00711  forall( n, B )
00712  {
00713    index_v[ n ] = i;
00714    i++;
00715  }
00716 
00717  i = 1;
00718  forall( n, A )
00719  {
00720    index_u[ n ] = i;
00721    i++;
00722  }
00723  
00724  double total_sum_and_index;
00725  int sum;
00726  int index_total = 0;
00727  forall( n, A )
00728  {
00729    sum = 0;
00730    total_sum_and_index = 0;
00731    index_total = 0;
00732    elist = G.adj_edges(n);
00733       forall_items( it , elist )
00734       {
00735          e = elist[it];
00736          u = G.source( e );
00737          v = G.target( e );
00738          index_total += index_v[ v ];
00739          total_sum_and_index += G[ e ] * index_v[ v ];
00740          sum += G[e];
00741          
00742        
00743       }
00744       if ( elist.empty() ){
00745         total_sum[ n ] = -1;
00746         total_bary[ n ] = -1;
00747       }else{
00748        total_sum[ n ] = sum;
00749        total_bary[ n ] = total_sum_and_index / sum;
00750       }  
00751    if( total_bary[ n ] > max )
00752      max = total_bary[ n ];
00753   
00754    //printf( "index total %d, total_sum_and_index %f, bary values %f \n", index_total,total_sum_and_index,total_bary[ n ] );
00755  }
00756  forall( n, B )
00757  {
00758   total_bary[ n ] = max + 1.0;
00759  }
00760  double tempx;
00761 
00762  i = 0;
00763  int count = 0;
00764 
00765  //drawBipartite( G,A,B );
00766 
00767  /*forall( n, A )
00768  {
00769   cout << total_bary[ n ] << "\n";
00770  }
00771  */
00772  
00773  i = 0;
00774  node min_node;
00775  double min;
00776  
00777  forall( n, A )
00778  {
00779   //cout << i << endl;
00780    forall( m, A )
00781    {
00782     if( i == 0 )
00783     {
00784      min_node = m;
00785      min = total_bary[ m ];
00786      //cout << total_bary[ min_node ] << "\n";
00787      i++;
00788     }
00789     else
00790     {
00791      if( total_bary[ m ] < min )
00792      {
00793       min_node = m;
00794       min = total_bary[ m ];
00795       //cout << "total_bary:" << total_bary[ min_node ] << "min:" << min << "\n";
00796      }  
00797     }
00798    }
00799    //cout << "\nmin after iteration\n" << min << endl;
00800    total_bary[ min_node ] = max + 2.0;
00801    A1.append( min_node );
00802 
00803    i = 0;
00804  }
00805  //A1.print();
00806  //cout << endl;
00807  //A.print();
00808  A.clear();
00809  A = A1;
00810  //cout << endl;
00811  //A.print();
00812 
00813  //drawBipartite( G,A1,B );
00814  //G.print();
00815 }
00816 
00817 /***********************************BARYCENTER****************************************/
00818 
00819 void barycenter_calc( matrix& m )
00820 {
00821  /*
00822   * b(u) = (W(uv_1)*c(v_1)+W(uv_2)*c(v_2)+...W(uv_i)*c(v_i))/sum
00823   * W( uv_x ) = wuvxtmp
00824   * c( v_x ) = cvindex
00825   */
00826 
00827  matrix bary_temp( m.dim1(), 1 );
00828  matrix sum_mtrx( m.dim1(), 1 );
00829 
00830  double temp_bary_value1;
00831  double temp_bary_value2=0;
00832  int cvindex;
00833  double wuvxtemp;
00834  double sum = 0;
00835  int i;
00836  int j;
00837  
00838 
00839 /*
00840 // *** for control aim
00841  cout << "\n\n";
00842  cout << "\nAfter the calculation Barycenter values \n";
00843  bary_temp.print();
00844  cout << "\n\nSum matrix is 0 for now";
00845  sum_mtrx.print();
00846 // ***
00847 */
00848 
00849  for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
00850   for( j = 0; j < m.dim2(); j++ ){
00851    if(  m( i,j ) != 0 ){
00852     sum += m( i,j );
00853     wuvxtemp = m( i,j );
00854     cvindex = j + 1;
00855     temp_bary_value1 = wuvxtemp * cvindex;
00856     temp_bary_value2 += temp_bary_value1;
00857    }
00858   }
00859   bary_temp( i, 0 ) = temp_bary_value2;
00860   sum_mtrx( i, 0 ) = sum;
00861   temp_bary_value2 = 0;
00862   sum = 0;
00863  }
00864 /*
00865 // *** for control aim
00866  cout << "\n\nSum matrix gets the values";
00867  sum_mtrx.print();
00868  cout << "\n\n";
00869 // ***
00870 */
00871  for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
00872   bary_temp( i, 0 ) = bary_temp( i, 0 ) / sum_mtrx( i, 0 );
00873  }
00874  
00875  int bary_index;
00876  int k;
00877 
00878  matrix bary_temp2( bary_temp.dim1(), 2 );
00879  
00880  for( k = 0; k < m.dim1(); k++ )
00881  {
00882   bary_temp2( k, 0 ) = bary_temp( k, 0 );
00883   bary_index = k;
00884   bary_temp2( k, 1 ) = bary_index;
00885  }
00886  /* You can use to see bary_temp2
00887  bary_temp2.print();
00888  */
00889  
00890  for( i=0; i < bary_temp2.dim1(); i++ )
00891  {
00892   for( j=0; j < i; j++ )
00893   {
00894    if( bary_temp2( i, 0 ) < bary_temp2( j, 0 ) )
00895    {
00896     double temp_member = bary_temp2( i, 0 ); //swap
00897     bary_temp2( i, 0 ) = bary_temp2( j, 0 );
00898     bary_temp2( j, 0 ) = temp_member;
00899   
00900     double temp_index_changer = bary_temp2( i, 1 ); //swap
00901     bary_temp2( i, 1 ) = bary_temp2( j, 1);
00902     bary_temp2( j, 1 ) = temp_index_changer;
00903   
00904     //I know there is a swap function but it does not worked.
00905     matrix temp(1,m.dim1());
00906     temp = m.row(i);
00907     m.row(i) = m.row(j);
00908     m.row(j) = temp;
00909    }
00910    else{
00911     if( bary_temp2( i, 0 ) < bary_temp2( j, 0 ) )
00912     {
00913      //do nothing but could be changed by extensions
00914     }
00915    }
00916  
00917   }
00918  }
00919 }

00921 /***********************************BARYCENTER END****************************************/
00922 
00923 
00924 node_matrix<double> buildCrossTableNodeMatrix(GRAPH<int,int> &G ,list<node> &A, list<node> B){
00925     int i;
00926 
00927     edge eu,ev;
00928     node u,v;
00929     node su,sv,tu,tv;
00930    
00931 
00932     node_array<int> naiB(G),naiA(G);
00933     node_matrix<double> nmdCrossTable(G);
00934 
00935     //reset crossTable
00936     forall(u,A)
00937         forall(v,A)
00938             nmdCrossTable[u][v] = 0.0;
00939 
00940     //create indexes of vertices of lower layer
00941     i=0;
00942     forall(u,B)
00943         naiB[u] = i++;
00944 
00945     //create indexes of vertices of upper layer
00946     i=0;
00947     forall(u,A)
00948         naiA[u] = i++;
00949 
00950    
00951     //Build Cross Table
00952     //Look for each edge pair if they cross each other or not.
00953     forall_edges(eu,G){
00954         forall_edges(ev,G){
00955             su = G.source(eu);
00956             sv = G.source(ev);
00957             tu = G.target(eu);
00958             tv = G.target(ev);
00959            
00960             if ( eu == ev )
00961                 break;
00962 
00963             if ( naiA[su] < naiA[sv] ){                            //u is before v?
00964 
00965                 if ( naiB[tv] < naiB[tu] )                        //do crossing?
00966                     nmdCrossTable[su][sv] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //yes
00967                 else if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )
00968                     nmdCrossTable[sv][su] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //no
00969 
00970 
00971             }else if ( naiA[su] > naiA[sv] ){                                                //v is before u?
00972 
00973                 if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )                        //do crossing?
00974                     nmdCrossTable[sv][su] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //yes
00975                 else if ( naiB[tv] < naiB[tu] )
00976                     nmdCrossTable[su][sv] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //no
00977             }
00978         }
00979     }
00980 
00981     return nmdCrossTable;
00982 }
00983 
00984 
00985 /******************************* GRE Graph Version ********************************/
00986 void GRE_graph( GRAPH<int,int> &G ,list<node> &A, list<node> B ){
00987     int i;
00988     double summinCurrent,summin,sumcuv;
00989 
00990     edge eu,ev;
00991     node selectedNode;
00992     node u,v;
00993     node su,sv,tu,tv;
00994     list_item it,minit;
00995 
00996     node_array<int> naiB(G),naiA(G);
00997     node_matrix<double> nmdCrossTable(G);
00998     list<node> L;
00999 
01000     //reset crossTable
01001     forall(u,A)
01002         forall(v,A)
01003             nmdCrossTable[u][v] = 0.0;
01004 
01005     //create indexes of vertices of lower layer
01006     i=0;
01007     forall(u,B)
01008         naiB[u] = i++;
01009 
01010     //create indexes of vertices of upper layer
01011     i=0;
01012     forall(u,A)
01013         naiA[u] = i++;
01014 
01015    
01016     //Build Cross Table
01017     //Look for each edge pair if they cross each other or not.
01018     forall_edges(eu,G){
01019         forall_edges(ev,G){
01020             su = G.source(eu);
01021             sv = G.source(ev);
01022             tu = G.target(eu);
01023             tv = G.target(ev);
01024            
01025             if ( eu == ev )
01026                 break;
01027 
01028             if ( naiA[su] < naiA[sv] ){                            //u is before v?
01029 
01030                 if ( naiB[tv] < naiB[tu] )                        //do crossing?
01031                     nmdCrossTable[su][sv] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //yes
01032                 else if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )
01033                     nmdCrossTable[sv][su] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //no
01034 
01035 
01036             }else if ( naiA[su] > naiA[sv] ){                                                //v is before u?
01037 
01038                 if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )                        //do crossing?
01039                     nmdCrossTable[sv][su] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //yes
01040                 else if ( naiB[tv] < naiB[tu] )
01041                     nmdCrossTable[su][sv] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //no
01042             }
01043         }
01044     }
01045 
01046     //printNodeMatrix(nmdCrossTable,A);
01047 
01048     //reset crossTable
01049     /*forall(u,A)
01050         forall(v,A)
01051             nmdCrossTable[u][v] = 0.0;
01052 
01053     list<edge> elistu,elistv;
01054     forall(u,A){
01055         forall(v,A){
01056             if ( naiA[u] == naiA[v] ){
01057                 break;
01058             }
01059             nmdCrossTable[u][v] = nmdCrossTable[v][u] = 0;
01060 
01061             elistu = G.adj_edges(u);
01062             elistv = G.adj_edges(v);
01063             forall(eu,elistu){
01064                 forall(ev,elistv){
01065                     tu = G.target(eu);
01066                     tv = G.target(ev);
01067 
01068 
01069                     if ( naiB[tv] > naiB[tu] )                        //do crossing?
01070                         nmdCrossTable[u][v] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //yes
01071                     else
01072                         nmdCrossTable[v][u] += G[eu] * G[ev];        //no
01073 
01074 
01075                    
01076                 }
01077             }
01078         }
01079     }
01080 
01081     printNodeMatrix(nmdCrossTable,A);*/
01082 
01083     /*leda::string x;
01084     x.read_line();*/
01085 
01086     L=A;
01087     A.clear();
01088     while ( !L.empty() ){
01089         summinCurrent=-1;
01090         forall_items(it,L){
01091             u=L[it];
01092             summin=sumcuv=0;
01093             forall(v,L){
01094                 if ( naiA[u] != naiA[v] ){
01095                     //add C(u,v) to sum
01096                     sumcuv += nmdCrossTable[u][v];
01097 
01098                     //add min( C(u,v) , C(v,u) ) to minimum sum
01099                     summin += nmdCrossTable[u][v]>nmdCrossTable[v][u]?nmdCrossTable[v][u]:nmdCrossTable[u][v];
01100                 }
01101             }
01102 
01103             if ( sumcuv == 0 ){
01104                 summin = 0;
01105             }else if ( summin == 0 ){
01106                 summin = MAXDOUBLE;
01107             }else{
01108                 summin = sumcuv / summin;
01109             }
01110 
01111             //look if the selected node u does less crossing than other vertices do
01112             if ( summinCurrent > summin || summinCurrent == -1 ){
01113                 selectedNode = u;
01114                 minit = it;
01115                 summinCurrent = summin;
01116                
01117                 if ( summin == 0 )
01118                     break;
01119             }
01120         }
01121        
01122         A.append(selectedNode);
01123         L.del_item(minit);
01124     }
01125 }

01128 /******************************   MEDIAN FUNCTIONS BEGINS  ********************************/
01129 
01130 /******************************   MEDIAN GRAPH *************************************/
01131 void median_graph( GRAPH<int,int> &G ,list<node> &A, list<node> B ){
01132     node_array< list<node> > medianPartitions( G );
01133 
01134     list<node> freePartition;
01135     list<node> tempA;
01136     list<edge> elist;
01137 
01138     node n;
01139 
01140     edge e1;
01141 
01142     long sum, median_sum;
01143    
01144     forall(n,A){
01145         sum = 0;
01146         median_sum = 0;
01147 
01148         elist = G.out_edges( n );
01149         forall(e1,elist){
01150             sum += G[e1];
01151         }
01152 
01153         //after iteration e1 is the median
01154         forall(e1,elist){
01155             median_sum += G[e1];
01156             if ( median_sum < sum/2 ){
01157             }else{
01158                 break;
01159             }
01160         }
01161 
01162         //if no node has no edge, we add it to freee partition which will not need to be sorted (using barycenter)
01163         if ( elist.size() == 0 ){
01164             freePartition.append(n);
01165         }else{
01166             medianPartitions[G.target(e1)].append(n);
01167         }
01168     }
01169 
01170     A.clear();
01171     A.conc(freePartition);
01172 
01173     forall(n,B){
01174         if ( medianPartitions[n].size() ){
01175             barycenter_graph(G,medianPartitions[n],B);
01176             A.conc(medianPartitions[n]);
01177         }
01178     }
01179 
01180 }
01181

01183 /******************************   MEDIAN GRAPH ENDS ******************************/
01184 
01185 /**************************** MEDIAN MATRIX **************************************/
01186 //Median Function : matrix partition is ( m.dim2(),m.dim1() )
01187 //Handles when there are equalities or there is equalities for median Partition
01188 //MODIFIED BARYCENTER FOR MEDIAN
01189 //calculates the barycenter values of the graph G( Matrix m ) Returns m with swapped values
01190 
01191 void barycenter_calc_for_median( matrix& m,int a, int b )
01192 {
01193  /*
01194   * b(u) = (W(uv_1)*c(v_1)+W(uv_2)*c(v_2)+...W(uv_i)*c(v_i))/sum
01195   * W( uv_x ) = wuvxtmp
01196   * c( v_x ) = cvindex
01197  */
01198 
01199  matrix bary_temp( m.dim1(), 1 );
01200  matrix sum_mtrx( m.dim1(), 1 );
01201 
01202  double temp_bary_value1;
01203  double temp_bary_value2=0;
01204  int cvindex;
01205  double wuvxtemp;
01206  double sum = 0;
01207  int i;
01208  int j;
01209  
01210 
01211 /*
01212 // *** for control aim
01213  cout << "\n\n";
01214  cout << "\nAfter the calculation Barycenter values \n";
01215  bary_temp.print();
01216  cout << "\n\nSum matrix is 0 for now";
01217  sum_mtrx.print();
01218 // ***
01219 */
01220 
01221  for( i = a; i <= b; i++ ){
01222   for( j = 0; j < m.dim2(); j++ ){
01223    if( m( i,j ) != 0 ){
01224     sum += m( i,j );
01225     wuvxtemp = m( i,j );
01226     cvindex = j + 1;
01227     temp_bary_value1 = wuvxtemp * cvindex;
01228     temp_bary_value2 += temp_bary_value1;
01229    }
01230   }
01231   bary_temp( i, 0 ) = temp_bary_value2;
01232   sum_mtrx( i, 0 ) = sum;
01233   temp_bary_value2 = 0;
01234   sum = 0;
01235  }
01236 /*
01237 // *** for control aim
01238  cout << "\n\nSum matrix gets the values";
01239  sum_mtrx.print();
01240  cout << "\n\n";
01241 // ***
01242 */
01243  for( i = a; i <= b; i++ ){
01244   bary_temp( i, 0 ) = bary_temp( i, 0 ) / sum_mtrx( i, 0 );
01245  // bary_temp.print();
01246  }
01247   
01248  int bary_index;
01249  int k;
01250 
01251  matrix bary_temp2( bary_temp.dim1(), 2 );
01252  
01253  for( k = a; k <= b; k++ )
01254  {
01255   bary_temp2( k, 0 ) = bary_temp( k, 0 );
01256   bary_index = k;
01257   bary_temp2( k, 1 ) = bary_index;
01258  }
01259  /* You can use to see bary_temp2
01260  bary_temp2.print();
01261  */
01262  
01263  for( i=0; i <= b; i++ )
01264  {
01265   for( j=0; j < i; j++ )
01266   {
01267    if( bary_temp2( i, 0 ) < bary_temp2( j, 0 ) )
01268    {
01269     double temp_member = bary_temp2( i, 0 ); //swap
01270     bary_temp2( i, 0 ) = bary_temp2( j, 0 );
01271     bary_temp2( j, 0 ) = temp_member;
01272   
01273     double temp_index_changer = bary_temp2( i, 1 ); //swap
01274     bary_temp2( i, 1 ) = bary_temp2( j, 1);
01275     bary_temp2( j, 1 ) = temp_index_changer;
01276   
01277     //I know there is a swap function but it does not worked.
01278     matrix temp(1,m.dim1());
01279     temp = m.row(i);
01280     m.row(i) = m.row(j);
01281     m.row(j) = temp;
01282    }
01283    else{
01284     if( bary_temp2( i, 0 ) < bary_temp2( j, 0 ) )
01285     {
01286      //do nothing but could be changed by extensions
01287     }
01288    }
01289  
01290   }
01291  }
01292  //bary_temp2.print(); //you can use to control that barycenter values are changed with index value
01293 }

01295  
01296 
01297 void Partition_Preprocess( matrix& m, matrix& median_index, matrix& partition )
01298 {
01299  //For this case there could be
01300 int i,j;
01301 
01302  for( i=0; i < median_index.dim1(); i++ )
01303  {
01304   for( j=0; j < i; j++ )
01305   {
01306    if( median_index( i, 0 ) < median_index( j, 0 ) )
01307    {
01308     double median_member = median_index( i, 0 ); //swap
01309     median_index( i, 0 ) = median_index( j, 0 );
01310     median_index( j, 0 ) = median_member;
01311   
01312     double median_weight_changer = median_index( i, 1 ); //swap
01313     median_index( i, 1 ) = median_index( j, 1);
01314     median_index( j, 1 ) = median_weight_changer;
01315 
01316     double median_index_changer = median_index( i, 2 ); //swap
01317     median_index( i, 2 ) = median_index( j, 2 );
01318     median_index( j, 2 ) = median_index_changer;
01319    }
01320   }
01321  }
01322 
01323 //Partition Begins here until next Comments
01324 
01325 matrix arraya( 100,100 ); // Bunları Array matrix size ına göre değiştirmemiz gerekecek
01326 matrix arrayb( 100,100 );// Bunları Array matrix size ına göre değiştirmemiz gerekecek
01327 int k=0;
01328 int array_index=0;
01329 int u_index = 0;
01330 
01331  for( i = 0; i < median_index.dim1(); i++ )
01332  {
01333   if( i == 0 )
01334   {
01335    arraya( i , k ) = median_index( 0 , 0 );
01336    arrayb( i , k ) = median_index( 0 , 2 );
01337    k++;
01338    //arraya.print();
01339   }
01340   else
01341   {
01342    if( median_index( i, 0 ) == median_index( (i-1), 0 ) )
01343    {
01344     arraya( array_index , k ) = median_index( i, 0 );
01345     arrayb( u_index , k ) = median_index( i, 2 );
01346     k++;
01347     //arraya.print();
01348    }
01349    if( median_index( i, 0 ) != median_index( (i-1), 0 ) )
01350    {
01351      arraya( array_index , k ) = -1;
01352      arrayb( u_index , k ) = -1;
01353      k = 0;
01354      array_index++;
01355      u_index++;
01356      arraya( array_index , k ) = median_index( i, 0 );
01357      arrayb( u_index , k ) = median_index( i, 2 );
01358      k++;
01359      //arraya.print();
01360   
01361    }
01362   }
01363  }
01364  arraya( array_index, k ) = -1;
01365  arraya( ++array_index, 0 ) = -1;
01366  arrayb( u_index, k ) = -1;
01367  arrayb( ++u_index, 0 ) = -1;
01368 
01369  int a = 0;
01370 //PARTITION first step is done
01371 // Begin with Step 2 does with Barycenter
01372  matrix temp_for( m.dim1(),m.dim2() );
01373  
01374  int array_layer = 0;
01375  k = 0;
01376  for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ )
01377  {
01378   if( i == 0 && array_layer == 0 )
01379   { 
01380    //For all partioned layer we would make Barycenter call.
01381    temp_for.row( i ) = m.row( arrayb(  array_layer,k ) );
01382    k++;
01383   }
01384   if( i > 0 &&  arrayb( array_layer,k ) == -1.0 && i < m.dim1() )
01385   {
01386    barycenter_calc_for_median( temp_for, a, i );
01387    array_layer++;
01388    k = 0;
01389    a = i;
01390   }
01391   if( i > 0 &&  arrayb(  array_layer,k ) != -1.0 && i < m.dim1() )
01392   {
01393    temp_for.row( i ) = m.row( arrayb( array_layer,k ) );
01394    k++;
01395   }
01396 
01397   if( i > 0 &&  arrayb( k, array_layer ) == -1.0 && k == 0 && i == m.dim1() )
01398   {
01399    break;
01400   }
01401  }
01402  m = temp_for;
01403 }
01404 
01405 
01406 //Finds the median for all u's inside the m and then makes swap operation for matrix m. Matrix operation is done over the same matrix m.
01407 
01408 //Median Function
01409 void median_calc( matrix& m )
01410 {
01411  matrix median_temp( m.dim1(), m.dim2() );
01412  matrix median( m.dim1(), 1 );
01413  matrix median_temp3( median_temp.dim1(), 3 );
01414  int i;
01415  int j;
01416  int flag = 0;
01417  int median_calc = 0;
01418 // double weigth;
01419  double sum = 0;
01420 
01421  for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
01422   for( j = 0; j < m.dim2(); j++ ){
01423    sum += m( i,j );
01424    median_temp( i , j ) = m( i , j );
01425  
01426    //if there is no node flag is 0
01427    if( median_temp( i , j ) !=  0 )
01428     flag++;
01429    //x_j[ v_|j/2| ]
01430    median_calc += ( double ) median_temp( i , j )* ( j + 1 );
01431   }
01432   if( flag == 0 )
01433   {
01434    median( i, 0 ) = 0;
01435   }
01436   else
01437   {
01438    j = ( int ) median_calc / sum;
01439    median( i, 0 ) = median_temp( i , j );
01440  //  printf( "\nindex %d : median is %f from median_temp( %d , %d ) = %f",i,median( i, 0 ),i,j,median_temp( i , j ) );
01441    median_temp3( i, 0 ) = j;
01442   }
01443   sum = 0;
01444   median_calc = 0;
01445  }
01446  int median_index;
01447  int k;
01448 
01449  matrix median_temp2( median_temp.dim1(), 2 );
01450  matrix median_equal( m.dim1(), m.dim2() );
01451  
01452  for( k = 0; k < m.dim1(); k++ )
01453  {
01454   median_temp2( k, 0 ) = median( k, 0 );
01455   median_index = k;
01456   median_temp2( k, 1 ) = median_index;
01457  }
01458  int index_u;
01459  for( k = 0; k < m.dim1(); k++ )
01460  {
01461   index_u = median_temp2( k,1 );
01462   median_temp3( k, 2 ) = index_u;
01463   median_temp3( k, 1 ) = median_temp2( k,0 );
01464  }
01465 // cout << "\nAfter 3\nMedian V| Weight |U index ";
01466 // median_temp3.print();
01467 
01468  matrix partition( m.dim2(),m.dim1() );
01469  Partition_Preprocess( m, median_temp3, partition );
01470 
01471 }
01472 
01473 /******************************  END MEDIAN   **************************************/
01474

01481 void assignWeight(matrix &m,int sumOfWeight,int weightBalance){
01482     int row=m.dim1(),col=m.dim2();
01483     int i,j;
01484     list<point> edges;
01485     leda::random_source S;
01486     list_item it;
01487     for ( i=0; i<row; i++ ){
01488         for ( j=0; j<col; j++ ){
01489             if ( m(i,j) != (double)0.0 ){
01490                 point p((double)i,(double)j);
01491                 edges.append(p);
01492             }else{
01493                 if ( edges.size() > 1 ){
01494                     it = edges.first();
01495                     point p = (point)edges.head();
01496                     edges.del(it);
01497                     edges.append(p);
01498                 }
01499             }
01500             //edges.print();
01501             //cout << "\n";
01502         }
01503     }
01504 
01505     point p;
01506     int w;
01507     sumOfWeight -= edges.size();
01508     //edges.print();
01509     //cout << "\n";
01510     i=0;
01511     j=0;
01512     while ( sumOfWeight > 0 && !edges.empty() ){
01513         j++;
01514         forall (p,edges){
01515             i++;
01516             //cout << "SumofWeight: "<<sumOfWeight<<"\n";
01517             if ( sumOfWeight < weightBalance*2 ){
01518                 m((int)p.X(),(int)p.Y()) += weightBalance;
01519                 sumOfWeight -= weightBalance;
01520                 break;
01521             }else{
01522                 S >> w;
01523                 w %= sumOfWeight/weightBalance;
01524                 m((int)p.X(),(int)p.Y()) += w;
01525                
01526                 sumOfWeight -= w;
01527             }
01528         }
01529 
01530     }
01531     //cout << ":::::::::: " << i << " :: " << j << "\n";
01532 }
01533 
01534 void randomGraph2(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A,list<node> &B,int aCount,int bCount,double edgeDensity,int sumOfWeight,int weightBalance){
01535 
01536     leda::random_source S;
01537     matrix m(aCount,bCount);
01538     int i,j;
01539     int max = 1;
01540     S.set_range(0,max);
01541     double d;
01542 
01543     //cout << "Edge Density: " << edgeDensity << "\n";
01544     for ( i=0; i<aCount; i++ ){
01545         for ( j=0; j<bCount; j++ ){
01546             S >> d;
01547             d = d / (double)max;
01548             //cout << "D: " << d << "\n";
01549             if ( d < edgeDensity ){
01550                 m(i,j) = 1.0;
01551             }else{
01552                 m(i,j) = 0.0;
01553             }
01554         }
01555     }
01556 
01557    
01558 
01559     assignWeight(m,sumOfWeight,weightBalance);
01560     m2g(G,A,B,m,true);
01561    
01562 }

01567 
01568 integer crossing_numberG(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A,list<node> &B){
01569     node_array<int> indexB(G),indexA(G);
01570     array<node> arrayA(A.size());
01571     node n,sn1,sn2,tn1,tn2;
01572     int i;
01573     integer crossingCount = 0;
01574     list<edge> edges1,edges2;
01575     edge edge1,edge2;
01576 
01577 
01578     i=0;
01579     forall(n,B){
01580         indexB[n] = i;
01581         i++;
01582     }
01583 
01584     i=0;
01585     forall(n,A){
01586         indexA[n] = i;
01587         arrayA[i] = n;
01588         i++;
01589     }
01590 
01591 
01592     forall(sn1,A){
01593         edges1 = G.adj_edges(sn1);
01594 
01595         forall(edge1,edges1){
01596             tn1 = G.target(edge1);
01597 
01598            
01599             for ( i=indexA[sn1]+1; i < arrayA.size(); i++ ){
01600                 sn2 = arrayA[i];
01601                 edges2 = G.adj_edges(sn2);
01602 
01603                 forall(edge2,edges2){
01604                     tn2 = G.target(edge2);
01605 
01606                     if ( indexB[tn1] > indexB[tn2] ){
01607                         crossingCount.operator +=(G[edge1]*G[edge2]);
01608                     }
01609 
01610                 }
01611             }
01612 
01613 
01614         }
01615 
01616     }
01617    
01618     return crossingCount;
01619 
01620 }
01621 
01622 void randomGraph_(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A,list<node> &B,int iANodeCount, int iBNodeCount, int completeNess,int sumOfWeight,bool useCoefficient=false){
01623     int edgeCount = iANodeCount*iBNodeCount*(completeNess%1001)/1000;
01624     int i,j;
01625     int weight;
01626     if ( edgeCount == 0 ){
01627         edgeCount = 1;
01628     }
01629     int averageWeight= sumOfWeight/edgeCount;
01630     if ( averageWeight == 0 ){
01631         averageWeight = 1;
01632     }
01633     random_bigraph(G,iANodeCount,iBNodeCount,edgeCount,A,B,1);
01634     matrix m = g2m(G,A,B,false);
01635 
01636     leda::random_source S;
01637 
01638     while ( sumOfWeight > 0 ){
01639         for ( i=0; i<m.dim1(); i++ ){
01640             for ( j=0; j<m.dim2(); j++ ){
01641                 if ( m[i][j] != 0 ){
01642                     if ( sumOfWeight <= averageWeight ){
01643                         weight = sumOfWeight;
01644                         sumOfWeight = 0;
01645                     }else{
01646                         S >> weight;
01647                         weight = (weight%(averageWeight*2))%sumOfWeight +1;
01648                         sumOfWeight -= weight;
01649                     }
01650                    
01651                     if ( useCoefficient ==  true ){
01652                         m[i][j] *= weight;
01653                     }else{
01654                         m[i][j] = weight;
01655                     }
01656                    
01657                     if ( sumOfWeight == 0 ){
01658                         i= m.dim1();
01659                         j=m.dim2();
01660                         break;
01661                     }
01662                 }
01663             }
01664         }
01665     }
01666 
01667     m2g(G,A,B,m,true);
01668 }

01674     //return graphfile;
01675 }

01678 int calculateSumOfWeight(int a,int b, int cn, int averageWeight){
01679     int edges = a*b*(cn%1001)/1000 + 1;
01680 
01681     return edges*averageWeight;
01682 }

01687 integer crossing_numberM(matrix &m){
01688     integer crossingCount = 0,temp;
01689    
01690     int i,j;
01691     int col,row;
01692     col = m.dim2();
01693     row = m.dim1();
01694     double d=0.0;
01695     matrix mc(row,col);
01696 
01697    
01698     for ( i=0; i<row; i++ ){
01699         mc(i,col-1) = 0.0;
01700     }
01701 
01702     for ( i=0; i<col; i++ ){
01703         mc(0,i) = 0.0;
01704     }
01705 
01706     //m.print();
01707 
01708     //mc.print();
01709     double areaA,areaB,areaC;
01710     for ( i=1; i<=row-1; i++ ){
01711         for ( j=col-2; j>=0; j-- ){
01712             //mc(i,j) = m(i-1,j+1) + mc(i,j+1) + mc(i-1,j);
01713             areaA = areaB = areaC = 0.0;
01714 
01715             /*if ( i-2 >= 0 ){
01716                 areaB = mc(i-2,j+1);
01717 
01718             }
01719 
01720             if ( j+2 < col ){
01721                 areaA = mc(i-1,j+2);
01722                 if ( i-2 >= 0 ){
01723                     areaC = mc(i-2,j+2);
01724 
01725                 }
01726 
01727             }*/
01728             areaA = mc(i,j+1);
01729             areaB = mc(i-1,j);
01730             areaC = mc(i-1,j+1);
01731             //cout << i-1 << "\n";
01732             //cout << j+1 << "\n";
01733             double temp2=m(i-1,j+1);
01734             mc(i,j) = (areaB-areaC) + (areaA-areaC) + areaC +  temp2;
01735            
01736             //mc.print();
01737             temp = mc(i,j)*m(i,j);
01738             int t = (int)temp.to_long();
01739             crossingCount.operator +=(temp);
01740            
01741            
01742 
01743         }
01744     }
01745 
01746 
01747 
01748     return crossingCount;
01749 }

01753     return crossing_numberM(m);

01756 void writeRow(ofstream &report,int aCount,int bCount,int cn,int sumOfWeight,int aw,array<integer> crossingAverages,string extra,array<int> winTable){
01757     double realPer = -0.1;
01758     int j;
01759     string td_("<td ");
01760     string td(td_ + extra + " >");
01761     string tr("<tr>");
01762     integer temp;
01763     string style("");
01764 
01765     report << tr;
01766     report << td << aCount << "x" << bCount;
01767     report << td << cn;
01768     report << td << sumOfWeight;
01769     report << td << aw;
01770     report << td << sumOfWeight/aw;
01771     report << td << "==>";
01772 
01773    
01774 
01775     int minJ=defOriginal;
01776     for ( j=0; j<defLast; j++ ){
01777         if ( crossingAverages[minJ] > crossingAverages[j] ){
01778             minJ=j;
01779         }
01780     }
01781     int minJ3=defBary;
01782     for ( j=defBary; j<defLast; j++ ){
01783         if ( crossingAverages[minJ] > crossingAverages[j] ){
01784             minJ3=j;
01785         }
01786     }
01787 
01788     int minJ2=defWolf;
01789     for ( j=0; j<defBary; j++ ){
01790         if ( crossingAverages[minJ2] > crossingAverages[j] && j != defWolf ){
01791             minJ2=j;
01792         }
01793     }
01794 
01795     cout << "minJ: " << minJ << ", minJ2: " << minJ2 << ", minJ3: " << minJ3 << "\n";
01796     if ( crossingAverages[defWolf].iszero() && crossingAverages[minJ2].iszero() ){
01797         realPer = 0.0;
01798         style = "zero";
01799 
01800     }else if ( crossingAverages[defWolf].iszero() ){
01801         realPer = 0.0;
01802         style = "wolfZero";
01803 
01804     }else if ( crossingAverages[minJ2].iszero() ){
01805         realPer = 0.0;
01806         style = "wolfError";
01807 
01808     }else if ( defWolf == minJ ){
01809         temp = crossingAverages[minJ];
01810         temp.operator *=(100000);
01811         realPer = (temp / crossingAverages[minJ3]).to_double();
01812         realPer = (double)(realPer/1000.0 - 100.0);
01813 
01814         style = "wolfGood";
01815 
01816     }else if ( minJ != defWolf ){
01817         temp = crossingAverages[minJ3];
01818         temp.operator *=(100000);
01819         realPer = (temp / crossingAverages[defWolf]).to_double();
01820         realPer = (double)(realPer/1000.0 - 100.0);
01821 
01822         style = "wolfBad";
01823         if ( crossingAverages[defWolf] < crossingAverages[minJ3] ){
01824             style = "wolfGood";
01825         }
01826    
01827     }else{
01828         style = "equal";
01829         realPer = 0.0;
01830 
01831     }
01832 
01833 
01834     string extra2("");
01835     for ( j=0; j<defLast; j++ ){
01836         if ( j == defWolf ){
01837             extra2 = " style=\"background: #FFF666;\" ";
01838         }else{
01839             extra2 = "";
01840         }
01841         if ( minJ==j ){
01842             report << td_ << extra << extra2 << " style=\"font-weight: bold; text-decoration:underline;\">" << crossingAverages[j];
01843         }else if ( minJ2==j){
01844             report << td_ << extra << extra2 << " style=\"text-decoration:underline;\">" << crossingAverages[j];
01845         }else if ( minJ3 == j ){
01846             report << td_ << extra << " style=\"color: blue;\">" << crossingAverages[j];
01847         }else{
01848             report << td_ << extra2 << ">" << crossingAverages[j];
01849         }
01850     }
01851 
01852 
01853     report << td_ << "class=\""<<style<<"\">' " << realPer;
01854 
01855     report << td << "    " << partitionCount << "    ";
01856 
01857     int maxJ=minJ;
01858     for ( j=1; j<defLast; j++ ){
01859         if ( winTable[maxJ] < winTable[j] ){
01860             maxJ=j;
01861         }
01862     }
01863 
01864     for ( j=1; j<defLast; j++ ){
01865         report << td_ << "class=\""<<(j==maxJ?"winner":"")<<"\" style=\""<<(winTable[j]>0?"font-weight: bold;":"")<<"\">" << winTable[j];
01866     }
01867 
01868     report << "\n";
01869    
01870 }
01871 
01872 double crossing_for_an_edge( matrix &m, int i , int j){
01873     double sum = 0;
01874     int k , l;
01875 
01876     for( k = i - 1 ; k >= 0; k-- ){
01877         for( l = j + 1; l < m.dim2(); l++ )
01878             sum += m(k,l);
01879     }
01880     return sum*m[i][j];
01881 }
01882 
01883 integer crossingNumber(matrix &m){
01884     integer crossingCount = 0,temp;
01885     int i,j;
01886     int col,row;
01887     col = m.dim2();
01888     row = m.dim1();
01889     //double d=0.0; //////
01890     double temp2;
01891     matrix mc(row,col);
01892 
01893    
01894     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01895         mc(i,col-1) = 0.0;
01896     }
01897 
01898     for ( i=0 ; i<col ; i++ ){
01899         mc(0,i) = 0.0;
01900     }
01901 
01902     double areaA,areaB,areaC;
01903     for ( i=1 ; i<=row-1 ; i++ ){
01904         for ( j=col-2 ; j>=0 ; j-- ){
01905             //mc(i,j) = m(i-1,j+1) + mc(i,j+1) + mc(i-1,j);
01906             areaA = areaB = areaC = 0.0;
01907             areaA = mc(i,j+1);
01908             areaB = mc(i-1,j);
01909             areaC = mc(i-1,j+1);
01910             temp2=m(i-1,j+1);
01911             mc(i,j) = (areaB-areaC) + (areaA-areaC) + areaC +  temp2;
01912             temp = mc(i,j)*m(i,j);
01913             crossingCount.operator +=(temp);          
01914 
01915         }
01916     }
01917 
01918     return crossingCount;
01919 }
01920 
01921 integer crossingNumber(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B){
01922     matrix m=g2m(G,A,B,true);
01923     return crossingNumber(m);
01924 }

01927 
01928 void m2g(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B, matrix &m, bool weighted=true){
01929     /*
01930      * weight e�er false verilirse, weight'� 5 olan bi edge', 5 defa teker teker ekler. Bu durumda edgein xtype integer de�eri s�f�r olarak atan�r. B�R OLARAK DE��L!!!
01931      * weight'in default de�eri true'dur, yani weight arguman� verilmez ise, weight true olarak set edilir. Bu durumda yarat�lan graphda, duplicate edgeler olmaz,
01932      *     Ayn� source ve target'a sahip ka� edge varsa, sadece 1 tane edge olarak eklenir ve o edge'in xtype'� duplication say�s�na ayarlan�r.
01933      * Arguman olarak verilen Graph, �st layer node listesi (A), ve alt layer node listesi(B) i�ersinde bulunan b�t�n elemanlar temizlenir.
01934      */
01935     int i,j;
01936     int k;
01937     int row=m.dim1(),col=m.dim2();
01938     array<node> A1(row),B1(col);
01939     edge e;
01940     node sn,tn;
01941     A.clear();
01942     B.clear();
01943     G.clear();
01944 
01945     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01946         sn = G.new_node();
01947         A1[i] = sn;
01948         A.append(sn);
01949     }
01950 
01951     for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01952         tn = G.new_node();
01953         B1[j] = tn;
01954         B.append(tn);
01955     }
01956 
01957     if ( weighted ){
01958         for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01959             for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01960                 if ( (int)m(i,j) != 0 ){
01961                     e = G.new_edge(A1[i],B1[j],(int)m(i,j));
01962                     G[e] = (int)m(i,j);
01963                 }
01964             }
01965         }
01966     }else{
01967         for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01968             for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01969                 for ( k=0 ; k<(int)m(i,j) ; k++ ){
01970                     e = G.new_edge(A1[i],B1[j]);
01971                     G[e] = 0;
01972                 }
01973             }
01974         }
01975     }
01976 }
01977 
01978 matrix g2m(GRAPH<int,int>& G, list<node> A, list<node> B, bool weighted=true){
01979     int i,j;
01980     int row=A.size(),col=B.size();
01981     matrix m(row,col);
01982     node_array<int> A1(G),B1(G);
01983 
01984     edge e;
01985     node n;
01986     for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
01987         for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
01988             m(i,j) = (double)0;
01989         }
01990     }
01991     i=0;
01992     forall(n,A){
01993         A1[n] = i;
01994         i++;
01995     }
01996 
01997     i=0;
01998     forall(n,B){
01999         B1[n] = i;
02000         i++;
02001     }
02002 
02003     node sn,tn;
02004     forall_edges(e,G){
02005         sn = G.source(e);
02006         tn = G.target(e);
02007 
02008         if ( weighted ){
02009             m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = G[e];
02010         }else{
02011             m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) + (double)1.0;
02012         }
02013     }
02014 
02015     return m;
02016 }
02017 
02018 int getCrossings(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> &B){
02019     list<node> A_,B_;
02020     GRAPH<int,int> G_;
02021     int i;
02022     node n,newn,tn,corn,cortn;
02023     edge e;
02024     array<node> originalA(A.size());
02025     array<node> originalB(B.size());
02026     array<node> A__(A.size()),B__(B.size());
02027     node_array<int> naiB(G);
02028    
02029     i=0;
02030     forall(n,A){
02031         newn = G_.new_node();
02032         A_.append(newn);
02033         A__[i] = newn;
02034         originalA[i] = n;
02035         i++;
02036     }
02037 
02038     i=0;
02039     forall(n,B){
02040         newn = G_.new_node();
02041         B_.append(newn);
02042         B__[i] = newn;
02043         naiB[n] = i;
02044         originalB[i] = n;
02045         i++;
02046     }
02047 
02048     for ( i=0 ; i<originalA.size() ; i++ ){
02049         n = originalA[i];
02050         corn = A__[i];
02051         forall_adj_edges(e,n){
02052             tn = G.target(e);
02053             cortn = B__[naiB[tn]];
02054             edge e2 = G_.new_edge(corn,cortn);
02055             G_[e2] = G[e];
02056         }
02057     }
02058 
02059     integer uv = crossingNumber(G_,A_,B_);
02060     A_.reverse();
02061     integer vu = crossingNumber(G_,A_,B_);
02062 
02063     if ( uv < vu ){
02064         return -1;
02065     }else{
02066         return 1;
02067     }
02068 }
02069 
02070 
02071 
02072 void wolfPhase2(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &ptRow, node owner ,list<node> alt){
02073     int size = ptRow.size();
02074     int half = (int)size/2 ;
02075     list<node> R, L;
02076       
02077     if ( ptRow.size() == 1 || ptRow.size() == 0 ){
02078         return ;
02079     }else {
02080         ptRow.split(ptRow[half],L,R ); 
02081         wolfPhase2( G , L , owner , alt );
02082         wolfPhase2( G , R , owner , alt );
02083         merge ( G, ptRow, L , R , owner , alt) ;
02084     }
02085 }
02086 
02087 void wolf(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &A, list<node> B){
02088     int i,j,k,neighbourWeight;
02089     int leftsum=0,rightsum=0;
02090    
02091     node n=nil;
02092     node ntemp;
02093     int min;
02094     list_item it,minit;
02095     edge e=nil;
02096   
02097     array<node> anB(B.size()+1);
02098     array<node> partitionOwners(B.size()+1);
02099    
02100     array<list<node> > partitionMembers(B.size()+1);
02101    
02102     list<node> newA;
02103     list<node> temp,temp2;
02104     list<node> newAA;
02105 
02106     list<edge> elist,elist2;
02107    
02108     node_array<int> naiB(G);
02109     node_array<int> naiA(G);
02110    
02111     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << "\n\nWOLF PH1 STARTS\n---------------------\n";
02112 
02113     i=0;
02114     forall(n,A){
02115         naiA[n] = i++;
02116     }
02117     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02118     cout << "A:\n"; i=0; forall(n,A) cout << i << "\t" << n << "\n";
02119     cout << "naiA:\n"; forall(n,A) cout << "naiA[" << n << "]\t" << naiA[n] << "\n";
02120     }
02121 
02122     i=1;
02123     forall(n,B){
02124         naiB[n] = i;
02125         anB[i] = n;
02126         i++;
02127     }
02128     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
02129     cout << "B:\n"; i=0; forall(n,B) cout << i << "\t" << n << "\n";
02130     cout << "naiB:\n"; forall(n,B) cout << "naiB[" << n << "]\t" << naiB[n] << "\n";
02131     cout << "anB:\n"; for ( i=0 ; i<B.size()+1 ; i++ ) cout << "anB[" << i << "]\t" << anB[i] << "\n";
02132     }
02133     partitionOwners = anB;
02134 
02135 
02136     forall(n,A){
02137         elist = G.adj_edges(n);
02138         elist2.clear();
02139         while (elist.size()>0){
02140             min=B.size()*2;
02141             forall_items(it,elist){
02142                 e = elist[it];
02143                 ntemp = G.target(e);
02144 
02145                 if ( naiB[ntemp] < min ){
02146                     min = naiB[ntemp];
02147                     minit = it;
02148                 }
02149             }
02150             e = elist[minit];
02151             elist.del_item(minit);
02152             elist2.append(e);
02153         }
02154         elist = elist2;
02155 
02156 
02157         leftsum=0;
02158         rightsum=0;
02159         forall(e,elist){
02160             rightsum += G[e];
02161         }
02162 
02163 
02164         k=0;
02165         list_item it;
02166         forall_items(it,elist){
02167             e = elist[it];
02168            
02169             k=naiB[G.target(e)]-1;
02170 
02171             rightsum -= G[e];
02172             if ( leftsum >= rightsum ){
02173                 break;
02174             }
02175 
02176             leftsum += G[e];
02177             if ( elist.succ(it) && naiB[G.target(e)] + 1 == naiB[G.target(elist[elist.succ(it)])] ){
02178                 neighbourWeight = G[elist[elist.succ(it)]];
02179             }else{
02180                 neighbourWeight = 0;
02181             }
02182             if ( leftsum >= rightsum - neighbourWeight ){
02183                 k++;
02184                 break;
02185             }
02186         }
02187 
02188         partitionMembers[k].append(n);
02189 
02190     }
02191 
02192    
02193     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02194     cout << "Partition Members\n";
02195     }
02196     for ( i=0 ; i<partitionMembers.size() ; i++ ){
02197         temp = partitionMembers[i];
02198         if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02199         cout << i << "\t=> "; temp.print();cout << "\n";
02200         }
02201     }
02202 
02203     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02204     j=0; forall(n,A) cout << j++ << " => " << n << "\t";
02205     }
02206    
02207 
02208     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << "0. Part -> ";
02209     forall(n,partitionMembers[0]){
02210         //G[n] = naiA[n];
02211         if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << n << " ";
02212         newA.append(n);
02213     }
02214 
02215    
02216     partitionCount=0;
02217     for ( i=1 ; i<partitionMembers.size() ; i++ ){
02218         temp = partitionMembers[i];
02219        
02220         if ( !temp.empty() ){
02221             partitionCount++;
02222         }
02223         if ( justRunPhase1 == 1 ){
02224         }else{
02225             if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
02226             cout << "("<< i <<") Before: "; temp.print(); cout << "\n";
02227             }
02228            
02229             wolfPhase2( G , temp , partitionOwners[i], B );
02230             if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
02231             cout << "("<< i <<") After: "; temp.print(); cout << "\n";
02232             }
02233 
02234             forall(n,temp){
02235                 //G[n] = naiA[n];
02236                 cout << "";
02237                 newA.append(n);
02238             }
02239         }
02240     }
02241    
02242     A= newA;
02243 }
02244 
02245 integer W2 ( GRAPH<int,int> &G , node alt1 , node alt2 , node ust , list<node> alt){
02246     integer sum=0;
02247     int start,end,i;
02248     int inRange=0;
02249     node n;
02250     list<edge> outedges = G.adj_edges(ust);
02251     edge e;
02252     node_array<int> alt_(G);
02253 
02254     if ( alt1 == nil ){
02255         return 0;
02256     }
02257 
02258     i=0;
02259     forall(n,alt){
02260         alt_[n] = i;
02261         if ( n == alt1 ){
02262             start = i;
02263         }
02264         if ( n == alt2 ){
02265             end = i;
02266         }
02267         i++;
02268     }
02269 
02270 
02271     forall(e,outedges){
02272         n = G.target(e);
02273         if ( alt_[n] >= start && alt_[n] <= end ){
02274             sum.operator +=(G[e]);
02275         }
02276     }
02277 
02278     return sum;
02279 }
02280 
02281 void merge(GRAPH<int,int> &G, list<node> &ptRow, list<node> &L, list<node> &R, node owner, list<node> &alt){
02282        int i=0 , j=0 ,k=0 ;
02283        int rsize,lsize;
02284        integer ul,vl,ur,vr ;
02285        node ownerNext ;
02286        list_item it;
02287        ptRow.clear();
02288 
02289        rsize= R.size();
02290        lsize = L.size();
02291 
02292        for ( i=0 ; i < lsize + rsize ; i++ ){
02293             if( k < rsize && j < lsize  ){ // bu conditionlar dogru mu ? kontrol 2
02294                 it = alt.search(owner);
02295                 it = alt.succ(it);
02296 
02297                 if ( it )
02298                     ownerNext = alt[it];
02299                 else
02300                     ownerNext = nil;
02301                 list<node> orderuv;
02302                 orderuv.append(L[L.get_item(j)]);
02303                 orderuv.append(R[R.get_item(k)]);
02304                
02305                 /*vr = weight(G    ,ownerNext            ,alt.tail()        ,R[R.get_item(k)]    ,alt    ) ;
02306                 vl = weight(G    ,alt.head()            ,owner            ,R[R.get_item(k)]    ,alt    ) ;
02307                 ul = weight(G    ,alt.head()            ,owner            ,L[L.get_item(j)]    ,alt    ) ;
02308                 ur = weight(G    ,ownerNext            ,alt.tail()        ,L[L.get_item(j)]    ,alt    ) ; */
02309                 //cout << "\nvl*ur : " << vl*ur << "\t" << "vr*ul : " << vr*ul  << "\n"  ; 
02310 
02311                 int ordering = getCrossings(G,orderuv,alt);
02312                
02313                 if (   /*( ur*vl ) <= ( vr*ul ) */ ordering == -1  ){
02314                    
02315                     ptRow.append( L[L.get_item(j)] );   
02316                     j++;
02317                     //cout << "\ncondition 1 \n" ;
02318                     //ptRow.print();
02319                     //cout << "\n";
02320                 }else {
02321                    
02322                     ptRow.append( R[R.get_item(k)] );
02323                     k++;
02324                     //cout << "\ncondition 2 \n" ;
02325                     //ptRow.print();
02326                     //cout << "\n";
02327                 }
02328 
02329             }else if ( k >= rsize && j < lsize ){
02330                 ptRow.append( L[L.get_item(j)] );   
02331                 j++;
02332                 //cout << "\ncondition 3 \n" ;
02333                 //ptRow.print();
02334                 //cout << "\n";
02335 
02336            }else if ( j >= lsize && k < rsize ){
02337                 ptRow.append( R[R.get_item(k)] );
02338                 k++;
02339                 //cout << "\ncondition 4 \n" ;  
02340                 //ptRow.print();
02341                 //cout << "\n";
02342            }
02343            
02344         }
02345       
02346 }

02378 void wolfBarycenter(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A,list<node> B){
02379     int i,j,k,neighbourWeight;
02380     int p0=0;
02381     int leftsum=0,rightsum=0;
02382    
02383     node n;
02384     edge e;
02385     node n1,n2;
02386   
02387     array<node> anB(B.size()+1);
02388     array<node> partitionOwners(B.size()+1);
02389    
02390     array< list<node> > partitionMembers(B.size()+1);
02391    
02392     list<node> newA;
02393     list<node> temp;
02394     list<node> newAA;
02395     list_item it;
02396 
02397     list<edge> elist;
02398    
02399     node_array<int> naiB(G);
02400     node_array<int> naiA(G);
02401    
02402     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << "\n\nWOLF PH1 STARTS\n---------------------\n";
02403 
02404     i=0;
02405     forall(n,A){
02406         naiA[n] = i++;
02407     }
02408     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02409     cout << "A:\n"; i=0; forall(n,A) cout << i << "\t" << n << "\n";
02410     cout << "naiA:\n"; forall(n,A) cout << "naiA[" << n << "]\t" << naiA[n] << "\n";
02411     }
02412 
02413     i=1;
02414     forall(n,B){
02415         naiB[n] = i;
02416         anB[i] = n;
02417         i++;
02418     }
02419     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
02420     cout << "B:\n"; i=0; forall(n,B) cout << i << "\t" << n << "\n";
02421     cout << "naiB:\n"; forall(n,B) cout << "naiB[" << n << "]\t" << naiB[n] << "\n";
02422     cout << "anB:\n"; for ( i=0; i<B.size()+1; i++ ) cout << "anB[" << i << "]\t" << anB[i] << "\n";
02423     }
02424     partitionOwners = anB;
02425 
02426 
02427     forall(n,A){
02429         // S O R T  N E I G H B O U R S //
02430         //                              //
02431         //                              //
02433 
02434 
02435         elist = G.adj_edges(n);
02436         leftsum=0;
02437         rightsum=0;
02438         forall(e,elist){
02439             rightsum += G[e];
02440         }
02441 
02442         /*for( list_item loop_it = elist.first(); it = loop_it, loop_it = elist.succ(loop_it); it ){
02443         }*/
02444 
02445         k=0;
02446         list_item it;
02447         forall_items(it,elist){
02448             e = elist[it];
02449            
02450             k=naiB[G.target(e)]-1;
02451             rightsum -= G[e];
02452             if ( leftsum >= rightsum ){
02453                 break;
02454             }
02455 
02456             leftsum += G[e];
02457             if ( elist.succ(it) && naiB[G.target(e)] + 1 == naiB[G.target(elist[elist.succ(it)])] ){
02458                 neighbourWeight = G[elist[elist.succ(it)]];
02459             }else{
02460                 neighbourWeight = 0;
02461             }
02462             if ( leftsum >= rightsum - neighbourWeight ){
02463                 k++;
02464                 break;
02465             }
02466         }
02467 
02468         partitionMembers[k].append(n);
02469 
02470     }
02471 
02472    
02473 
02474     /*cout << "Node list:\n";
02475     i=0;
02476     forall(n,A){
02477         cout << i << "\t=> " << n << "\n";
02478         i++;
02479     }
02480     */
02481 
02482     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02483     cout << "Partition Members\n";
02484     }
02485     for ( i=0; i<partitionMembers.size(); i++ ){
02486         temp = partitionMembers[i];
02487         if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02488         cout << i << "\t=> "; temp.print();cout << "\n";
02489         }
02490     }
02491 
02492     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ){
02493     j=0; forall(n,A) cout << j++ << " => " << n << "\t";
02494     }
02495    
02496 
02497     if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << "0. Part -> ";
02498     forall(n,partitionMembers[0]){
02499         //G[n] = naiA[n];
02500         if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) cout << n << " ";
02501         newA.append(n);
02502     }
02503 
02504    
02505     partitionCount=0;
02506     for ( i=1; i<partitionMembers.size(); i++ ){
02507         temp = partitionMembers[i];
02508        
02509         if ( !temp.empty() ){
02510             partitionCount++;
02511         }
02512         if ( justRunPhase1 == true ){
02513         }else{
02514             if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
02515             cout << "("<< i <<") Before: "; temp.print(); cout << "\n";
02516             }
02517             barycenter_graph( G , temp , B );
02518             if ( wolfDebug == 1 ) {
02519             cout << "("<< i <<") After: "; temp.print(); cout << "\n";
02520             }
02521 
02522             forall(n,temp){
02523                 //G[n] = naiA[n];
02524                 newA.append(n);
02525             }
02526         }
02527     }
02528    
02529     A= newA;
02530 }
02531 void wolfBarycenterSlidingWindow(GRAPH<int,int> &G,list<node> &A,list<node> B,int wsk=1){
02532     int i,j,k,neighbourWeight;
02533     int leftsum=0,rightsum=0;
02534     int windowSize;
02535    
02536     node n;
02537     edge e;
02538     node n1,n2;
02539   
02540     array<node> anB(B.size()+1);
02541     array<node> partitionOwners(B.size()+1);
02542    
02543     array< list<node> > partitionMembers(B.size()+1);
02544    
02545     list<node> Q;
02546     list<node> window;
02547     list_item it;
02548 
02549     list<edge> elist;
02550    
02551     node_array<int> naiB(G);
02552     node_array<int> naiA(G);
02553    
02554     i=0;
02555     forall(n,A){
02556         naiA[n] = i++;
02557     }
02558 
02559     i=1;
02560     forall(n,B){
02561         naiB[n] = i;
02562         anB[i] = n;
02563         i++;
02564     }
02565     partitionOwners = anB;
02566 
02567 
02568     forall(n,A){
02570         // S O R T  N E I G H B O U R S //
02571         //                              //
02572         //                              //
02574 
02575 
02576         elist = G.adj_edges(n);
02577         leftsum=0;
02578         rightsum=0;
02579         forall(e,elist){
02580             rightsum += G[e];
02581         }
02582 
02583         k=0;
02584         list_item it;
02585         forall_items(it,elist){
02586             e = elist[it];
02587            
02588             k=naiB[G.target(e)]-1;
02589             rightsum -= G[e];
02590             if ( leftsum >= rightsum ){
02591                 break;
02592             }
02593 
02594             leftsum += G[e];
02595             if ( elist.succ(it) && naiB[G.target(e)] + 1 == naiB[G.target(elist[elist.succ(it)])] ){
02596                 neighbourWeight = G[elist[elist.succ(it)]];
02597             }else{
02598                 neighbourWeight = 0;
02599             }
02600             if ( leftsum >= rightsum - neighbourWeight ){
02601                 k++;
02602                 break;
02603             }
02604         }
02605 
02606         partitionMembers[k].append(n);
02607 
02608     }
02609 
02610    
02611     int nonemptyPC=0;
02612     Q.clear();
02613     for ( i=1; i<partitionMembers.size(); i++ ){
02614         if ( !partitionMembers[i].empty() ){
02615             nonemptyPC++;
02616 
02617             forall(n,partitionMembers[i]){
02618                 Q.append(n);
02619             }
02620         }       
02621     }
02622 
02623     list<node> window_;
02624     //windowSize will be equal to half of the average of partition sizes
02625     //if we have nonemptyPC partitions, each partition has approx. n0/nonemptyPC vertices
02626     //after finding average parition size, we divide it by 2
02627     windowSize=A.size()/(nonemptyPC?nonemptyPC:1)/2;
02628     windowSize=windowSize==0?2:windowSize+1;
02629 
02630     A.clear();
02631     forall(n,partitionMembers[0]){
02632         A.append(n);
02633     }
02634 
02635     while ( !Q.empty() ){
02636         while ( window_.size() < windowSize && !Q.empty() ){
02637             window_.append(Q.pop());
02638         }
02639         barycenter_graph(G,window_,B);
02640         for ( i=0; i<wsk && !window_.empty(); i++ ){
02641             A.append(window_.pop());
02642         }
02643     }
02644     while ( !window_.empty() ){
02645         A.append(window_.pop());
02646     }
02647 }
02648 
02649 void split(const std::string& str, list< list<int> >& output, const string& delimiters = ","){
02650     output.clear();
02651     // Skip delimiters at beginning.
02652     std::string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
02653     // Find first "non-delimiter".
02654     std::string::size_type pos     = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
02655     int i;
02656     int elemCount=0;
02657     list<int> temp;
02658     while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos){
02659         // Found a token, add it to the vector.
02660         sscanf(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos).c_str(),"%d",&i);
02661         temp.append(i);
02662         elemCount++;
02663         if ( elemCount == 2 ){
02664             elemCount=0;
02665             output.append(temp);
02666             temp.clear();
02667         }
02668         // Skip delimiters.  Note the "not_of"
02669         lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
02670         // Find next "non-delimiter"
02671         pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
02672     }
02673 }
02674 
02675 void split(const std::string& str, list<int>& output, const string& delimiters = ","){
02676     output.clear();
02677     // Skip delimiters at beginning.
02678     std::string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
02679     // Find first "non-delimiter".
02680     std::string::size_type pos     = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
02681     int i;
02682     while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos){
02683         // Found a token, add it to the vector.
02684         sscanf(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos).c_str(),"%d",&i);
02685         output.append(i);
02686         // Skip delimiters.  Note the "not_of"
02687         lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
02688         // Find next "non-delimiter"
02689         pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
02690     }
02691 }
